sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    /* Application Bar */
    <v-app-bar :elevation="2">
      <template v-slot:prepend>
        <v-app-bar-nav-icon
          @click="drawer = !drawer"
          :icon="drawer ? 'mdi-close' : 'mdi-menu'"
        ></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
      </template>
      <v-app-bar-title class="text-center">todo</v-app-bar-title>
      <template v-slot:append>
        <v-btn icon="mdi-white-balance-sunny" @click="changeTheme"></v-btn>
      </template>
    </v-app-bar>
    /* Navigation Drawer */
    <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer" />
    <v-main>
      <router-link to="/">Home</router-link>
      <router-link to="about/">About</router-link>
      <router-view />
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import { useTheme } from "vuetify";

export default {
  name: "App",
  data() {
    return {
      drawer: false,
      theme: useTheme(),
      darkMode: false,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    changeTheme() {
      this.darkMode = !this.darkMode;
      this.theme.global.name = this.darkMode ? "darkTheme" : "lightTheme";
    },
  },
};
</script>
